name: GitLabHelper-YourGitlabAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open GitLab Helper”
”Alexa, ask GitLab Helper what is the status of gitlab pipelines”
”Alexa, tell GitLab Helper to run gitlab pipeline”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gitlab helper
des:
GitLab Helper can trigger Gitlab pipelines for you. You can also ask for status of recent pipelines.

Setup -
Initially GitLab Helper asks for your GitLab authentication. Once it is done, you are all set.

Features - 
- Trigger GitLab Pipeline for any project and branch
- Get the status of pipelines already triggered.

More features coming soon.
